Body:
I am trying to wok with Azure IoT in Beagebone black in Debian linux.

While building the SDK it gives the error. I am following the same code in Git. I did not modify anything.

Please help me to solve this. Please see the screenshot of the error Screenshot

"

I build the SDK successfully on my Debian virtual machine. Make sure you have [installed these packages](https://github.com/Azure/azure-iot-gateway-sdk/blob/master/doc/devbox_setup.md#set-up-a-linux-development-environment).
